food.name: Water

food.description: Espresso, Americano, cappucino,,,,we never disappoint

food.name: Juice
food.description: Fruit, vegetable and blended all in one hotel?

food.name: Milk
food.description: Nutrient-rich and whole to suit you

food.name: Soda
food.description: Cola, lemon-lime, fruit and citrus all at your convenient price!

food.name: Popcorn
food.description: Plain, air-popped popcorn and generally a healthy snack because, a whole grain high in fiber.

food.name: Almond
food.description: Highly nutrient-dense food, providing healthy fats, fiber, and several key vitamins and minerals.

food.name: Crackers
food.description: A flat, dry, savory baked food, typically made from flour and water.

food.name: Oat meal
food.description: A highly nutritious and popular breakfast food made from the processed seeds typically served as a hot porridge cooked with water or milk

food.name: Pudding
food.description: A creamy, smooth, sweet dessert that is similar to a custard.

food.name: Pie
food.description: A baked dish consisting of a pastry crust (the shell) that encases a sweet or savory filling.

food.name: Candy
food.description: a confection with  principal ingredient being typically sugar.

food.name: Ice-cream
food.description: A popular frozen dessert made from a blend of dairy ingredients, sweeteners, flavorings, and air

food.name: Cookies
food.description: A small, flat, or slightly raised sweet baked treat. You deserve some.

food.name: Cake
food.description: Cheese, Flourless, shortened and unshortened; we run this ship.

food.name: Veggies
food.description: We have all your favorites prepared to be used in savory

food.name: salad
food.description: A dish consisting of a mixture of small pieces of food, which is often served cold or at room temperature, and is usually dressed with a sauce or oil and vinegar.

food.name: Mashed potatoes
food.description: A classic side dish made by mashing boiled or steamed potatoes.

food.name: Grilled chicken
food.description: Chicken meat cooked over a grill, trust me, they are scrumptuos.

food.name: omelette
food.description: A classic dish made from eggs that are lightly beaten, seasoned, and quickly cooked with butter or oil in a frying pan.

food.name: Hearty pizza
food.description: A pizza, substantial, filling, loaded with toppings, a thick crust, or both.

food.name: Pot pie
food.description: A savory, deep-dish pie, typically topped with a flaky pastry crust (though some have a bottom crust as well)!

food.name: Beef stew
food.description: A hearty, comforting dish typically made by simmering chunks of beef with vegetables in a flavorful liquid for a long period.

food.name: Roast lamb
food.description: A whole lamb in your honour? We're never gonna slim

food.name: Carbonara
food.description: A classic Italian pasta dish known for its creamy, rich sauce made without any added cream.
